title: Rads Error for East Coast NA People
body: My 4 friends and I cannot even get onto league, it is saying that there is a rads error I wonder when there is onna be a fix. I googled some quick fixes but none of them have worked.

replies.body: I'm experiencing this same issue and I'm trying all the fixes out there but now I'm guessing it's not on my end...
there is a problem with the servers, wonder if somehting got attacked or failed.

There were some login and server issues last night per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Everything looks okay now.  Let me know if you're still getting this error as it may actually be unrelated.

go here and give this guy a upvote it works!!!  {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uQqoGVbw-cant-log-in-heres-a-fix
It's not just league there's some websites that don't work for me either. This isn't riot it's some either server error on the general provider or an attack.
It is just League its the only thing not working and allot of people are reporting the same issue and same message so it is a server error so just gotta chill tilll its fixed
That is what I am saying, it says they are working on a fix.
Same here. It had me confused for a bit, now I know I'm not alone.
I'm getting Rads error as well. HTTP error.
